title: How many books does the Kindle Fire hold? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is difficult to describe this directly, Most books will be under 2,000 kilobytes, this is about 2 megabytes. The new Kindle fires start at 16 Gigabytes or approximately 16,000 megabytes. For the sake of discussion, we will limit the usable memory to 10gigabytes (10,000 megabytes) so you are looking at roughly 5,000 books of a 2 meg avg (somewhat more or less with larger or smaller file sizes)
